subsection.name: Description
subsection.p: Declaration of the set of dependecies that this component type has on component suppliers.
A container will typically provide services to resolve service providers with components declaring depedencies by matching provider and dependency declarations.

subsection.name: Example XML
subsection.p: Dependency descriptors are contained within a single <dependencies> element. The <dependencies> element may contain 0..n <dependency/> declarations.
